dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database
program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like
documents with optional schemas.
dependent_to.name: mongodb

dependent_to.description: dateparser -- python parser for human readable dates
dependent_to.name: py-dateparser

dependent_to.description:
The Natural Language Toolkit (NLTK) is a Python package for natural
language processing.
dependent_to.name: py-nltk

dependent_to.description: (Soon to be) the fastest pure-Python PEG parser
dependent_to.name: py-parsimonious

dependent_to.description:
RADICAL-Utils contains shared code and tools for various RADICAL-
Cybertools packages.
dependent_to.name: py-radical-utils

dependent_to.description:
SacreBLEU is a standard BLEU implementation that downloads and manages
WMT datasets, produces scores on detokenized outputs, and reports a
string encapsulating BLEU parameters, facilitating the production of
shareable, comparable BLEU scores.
dependent_to.name: py-sacrebleu

dependent_to.description:
TatSu (the successor to Grako) is a tool that takes grammars in a
variation of EBNF as input, and outputs memoizing (Packrat) PEG parsers
in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-tatsu

dependent_to.description: tiktoken is a fast BPE tokeniser for use with OpenAI's models.
dependent_to.name: py-tiktoken

dependent_to.description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch
dependent_to.name: py-transformers

dependent_to.description: Tools for handling Unique Molecular Identifiers in NGS data sets
dependent_to.name: py-umi-tools

description: Alternative regular expression module, to replace re.
name: py-regex

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
